website_summaries.verdict: The Xbox 360 Wireless Controller with Transforming D-pad is a must-have for 360 gamers who demand a precise D-pad response.
pros: works well with vintage XBLA games originally built for D-pad controllers
cons: forces consumer to pay for play-and-charge kit
new face-button colors may confuse novice users

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print!!!
customer_reviews.text: Controller arrived as ordered but the charge cable was nowhere to be found and come to find out the battery it came with was bad. I was going to complain about the purchase but there it was in the fine print... No cable no battery included. Wtf it says in huge print play and charge!!!! How can I play or charge of I don't have the two other components? Makes absolutely no sense. So now I have to spend more money just to play!!! Should have just bought a new one for $5 more... Last time I shop warehouse deals.
customer_reviews.author: David Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Great but the battery will die after awhile
customer_reviews.text: I have had this item for about 13 months now: This is a really cool controller, but unfortunately, just like all of Microsofts rechargeable Xbox batteries, after about 8 months they will only be able to hold a charge for a few minutes. That small point set aside, the controller itself is very nice! The all silver finish really adds a nice change to the standard white and black that everyone else has. Overall, this was a good purchase but I wish Microsoft would put some more thought into making batteries that don't die so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Spencley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Controller with tacked on play-and-charge kit
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at how much I liked this controller. Anyone who has played on the 360 knows the D-pad is severely lacking in responsiveness. The design of this controller is simple, yet effective. I'm surprised Microsoft has not adapted this design for all of its controllers. The only downside, is that it comes with a Play and Charge kit(which is why they tack on the additional cost). The charging kit is the only downside to this purchase. The battery pack does not seem to hold a charge very long. I recommend traditional batteries. All in all, a good purchase if you are a serious gamer, or are thinking of purchasing for one.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse W.

customer_reviews.title: Not just another controller
customer_reviews.text: As the only real gamer in my household with my fiance only ever picking up a controller to watch netflix I wanted something a little better than average. The real reason I initially bought this was because my old rechargeable controller died and I was sick of having the cord get in the way in my gaming space. The D-pad pop out bit is cool but really more of a gimmick. I could see where it's useful to a point but not enough to really be worth buying as a number one feature. Overall, a good replacement if you want a rechargeable controller again. I wouldn't buy a stack of them, but as a main controller it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SteoanK

customer_reviews.title: High quality you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: This has grown to be one my go-to controllers. I own several of these in a variety of colors, but theres something about the silver that keeps me playing. The D-Pad is transforming which actually can come in handy sometimes with different games. Controller has a comfortable feel and all buttons and joysticks are smooth and high quality. If you have an X-box 360.....You need this controller
customer_reviews.author: Julie I. Pregosin

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: The controller looks cool, but it's very fragile. The D-Pad is made of cheap plastic and it seems very brittle. I ordered one new and had to send it back today because the D-Pad was broken WHILE IT WAS STILL IN THE BOX. This may have been due to the incompetence of those who shipped and packed the item, but it was a dark omen for the longevity of this controller. I ordered another one, and I hope it's in mint condition this time. However, don't buy from the seller called SpaceBound, Inc., just to be on the safe side. They seem to have poor quality control, as they sent a clearly broken product to Amazon for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen F. Scruby

customer_reviews.title: Battery Compartment Breaks Easily
customer_reviews.text: The controller works fine and I haven't had problems with the d-pad (although I don't play fighting games), but the main problem is with the compartment that the battery is placed into. The bottom part of the compartment (where the springs are) is weakly built and will break easily, even with gentle swapping of batteries. I have a friend who had the exact same problem with this controller, so I don't think it is just a problem with mine. I also never had this problem with the old wireless controllers. Once this piece breaks off, the controller is broken and useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ionotropic

customer_reviews.title: Serves it Purpose
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend wanted to get this controller for my console, strictly because it was the newest controller out at the time. Apart from it being silver, and the retractable z-pad there isn't anything to get this controller apart from the others. In fact, that gray scale buttons make it harder to play (if you are a noob like me, and don't have the controls memorized). Other than that, I haven't really found an advantage to the retractable z-pad but my boyfriend (who is an avid gamer) seems to enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jes Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good idea...bad engineering
customer_reviews.text: This was a good idea, however the life of this controller will be short. I bought this item for 49.99 and for the price compared to other Microsoft licensed controllers, it seemed to be a good deal because it came with the play and charge kit. Well after about a couple weeks the d-pad became very loose and wasn't as near as "tight" as it was outta the box. I returned my controller within the next couple of days and bought the traditional controller. If they could fix this d-pad issue I would give the controller 5 out of 5 but this is kind of a significant issue so its not a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Best Play and Charge kit
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a 360 for the very first time and just wanted another controller in case I play with a friend. I am normally a ps3 player so wanted something similar to the controller being wireless, or played with a usb cable while it charges and this is just that. I searched around quite a bit and found that this is the best deal since buying a wireless controller and the separate play and charge kit was more expensive. Plus, those were all a black controller and this one looks cooler. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mikesz

customer_reviews.title: New design xbox 360 controller
customer_reviews.text: Overall I would say this controller is an improvement over the last gen ones, I like the little upgrades like the hollow area on top of the joysticks instead of those four little brail dots that seem to wear down after a few months, this hollow area seems like it would last longer, also the finish of the controller isn't smooth like the last gen ones so its easier to hold onto....the pop up d pad is nice but I can't really tell a difference since I don't use it enough to notice, but defiantly a step up from the hold ones.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Controller, Excellent Performance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this controller because i only had two other Xbox controllers (one white bought used, and a black one that came with the console) and they were beginning to get a decent amount of use on them (sticking analog sticks mainly, but other minor things). This controller is an awesome package, a rechargeable battery (i no longer have to use AAs, saving quite a bit), and a good ol' xbox controller. The controller is beautiful, and performs excellent. Also, when i bought this, i was unsure whether it would come with a battery pack (for AAs) as well as a rechargeable pack, and to my delight, it came with both.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement over original controller
customer_reviews.text: This controller works well. The new D pad is cool, but honestly my favorite part is the slightly improved ergonomics on the control sticks. They just feel better, and for such an important part of the controller, that's definitely a good thing. Otherwise it's your typical xbox controller. NOTE: the play-and-charge usb connector will not connect the controller to your computer (it will charge but not allow you to play games). You need to buy the wireless PC adapter to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W

customer_reviews.title: awesome controller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this controller to replace the same one that my son had broken. I can't believe the difference between this controller and the others. The bumpers are easily pushed. There's no sticking to them at all. The joysticks have smooth movement. Buttons are smooth. Everything about the controller is smooth, right down to the color scheme. I would recommend this to anyone. This is an awesome controller. The only negative thing about this purchase was that I wished they had a faster shipping option. The only one provided was standard shipping so it did take 6 days to receive. Other than that I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: It's a controller, and it works.
customer_reviews.text: I docked it a star, only because the chrome paint does not mix well with hand sweat and can get real disgusting looking with how the chrome paint seems to warp. I've also had problem with the battery pack out lasting the play and charge kit; meaning the reuseable function of the battery would still be good when my play and charge kit stoped working and couldn't charge nor allow for wired playing when the battery was dead.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Josselyn

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it...
customer_reviews.text: I don't play the 360 too much, but I figured my husband would like this controller. His controller he got when he purchased the system years ago was giving him problems. The off-brand (GameStop) controller we bought him did not have the right feel to it. So, he was pleasantly surprised when this showed up in the mail. He likes the feel of the controller. He doesn't use the new D-pad feature for me to comment on it, but he definitely has a new favorite controller. He loves the look and the feel. It even works better for those hand-sweaters out there - it has a more grainy feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren P.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Built Controller
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved this controller, but then after some time it was all downhill from there. First, the battery stopped working and would not hold a charge. After about 2 months, the plastic on the bottom back that holds the battery started to crack. Eventually that broke completely off. Keep in mind that I take very good care of my gaming accessories and don't drop/toss them anywhere. I was expecting a better quality item from Microsoft.
customer_reviews.author: O.Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Best 360 controller yet!!!
customer_reviews.text: this controller is a great improvement over the older versions not only in performance but also in aesthetics. the new d-pad works excellent and the analog sticks feel much better as well. i love the gray and black color and as long as you're not a new 360 owner you should have no issues with the ABXY buttons being gray. i would recommend this new controller to anyone on the ropes about upgrading or if you just need a second or third remote.
customer_reviews.author: Selldweller

customer_reviews.title: Silver Edition!
customer_reviews.text: It's a regular Xbox controller, so unless you're an idiot and want to waste money like me, there's no reason to get this. I guess if you don't have an Xbox controller and you need one, this isn't a bad deal since it does come with the Play & Charge Kit, which definitely comes in handy for those long gaming sessions. Overall, I'm happy with my purchase, I just wish these things weren't so expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Ray M. Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Solid Controller
customer_reviews.text: Came faster than expected. It has the new DPad thing. I really dont care about the dpad not being precise of whatever. it works well looks good and i got it for a good price (40). It has pretty good feel to it, and like i said the dpad is fine. battery pack seems to have a kinda short life, but i already have other controllers and battery packs so it didnt really matter. the batter pack color also matches my halo ODST controller.
customer_reviews.author: jcg

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful controller, this replaced mine that broke and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great Controller!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this controller for a few months already and the grip is still the same as it was the day I bought it. I use the controller daily and the grip is a real help for most games. I love the spinning directional pad and the glossy chrome coloring. Every controller I have purchased in the past has gotten button jammed - so far I have had no problems and I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lawless

customer_reviews.title: Decent value quality depends on personal preference.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bundle deal because my play and charge kit broke. Play and charge kits usually run $20 so an extra $20-25 and you get a controller? Good value indeed. The play and charge kit functions properly and the new controller also works as advertised. Personally the force feedback on the joysticks of this new controller is more akin to madcat controllers as well as playstation controllers of years past. Aside from this, the new dpad works great and all of the other buttons function properly. Too Long Didn't Read: For the price this deal is great; despite the poor force feedback on the joysticks.
customer_reviews.author: MFern

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery pack
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described happy with the controller plug an play cord works . Battery pack will not take or even hold a charge. Other than the bad battery pack the controller was exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Well, I liked it anyway.
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever played with a normal xbox 360 controller, you're not going to be blown away by this controller. It's silver. It's got monotone buttons. The Play and Charge cord is black instead of that weird grey color. And, as everyone has mentioned, the D-pad. It's leaps and bounds better than the normal D-pad, but it's still not perfect. Don't expect a miracle here, but I am pleased with the new d-pad. It's the best you're going to get on a 360 controller.. its just not going to work miracles.
customer_reviews.author: Klaitu Ben-Johhn

customer_reviews.title: Nice Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: The D-pad works noticeably better than the standard 360 controller but the D-pad twist function, although really cool, doesn't really do much. Looks really cool being pretty much a gray scale and having the chrome Xbox button and D-pad. I really like mine and if you're a die hard with some extra money to blow you enjoy it too, but if you're on the fence between it and a regular controller and price matters it's actually not worth the extra cash. It's definitely a want item not a need item.
customer_reviews.author: Mannillo

customer_reviews.title: Best controller I ever had
customer_reviews.text: This new controller from microsoft is awesome, it has a little more weight to it i think which makes it feel sturdy. I like the rotating d-pad for different types of games and the colors of the controller are very cool and different. It comes with the charge and play with battery pack which makes this deal the best I have seen for a controller. Recommend it to anyone who needs a new controller.
customer_reviews.author: Captian Hrrrfmmm

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The transforming d-pad is a joke. It was being billed as a better d-pad but it works exactly the same no matter how you have it set. It's an overpriced gimmick that will break with normal wear and tear. I had to throw away mine because it broke.
customer_reviews.author: OX_Bigly

customer_reviews.title: Extremely unhappy and seeking refund/replacement for defective product
customer_reviews.text: Face buttons stick when pressed, making the controller entirely unusable. Also, I did not receive the Play & Charge Kit. I only got the controller with a AA battery pack. Unless I receive a replacement or a refund, this absolutely deserves a 1 star review. I've wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Rodkey

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Was in need of a new controller & wanted something other the regular black or white so figured a silver one would look great. Shipping came a day earlier & opened it up to find a very nice black controller. Not wanting to deal with the hassle of sending it back & waiting (they didn't have any anyway), i just kept it. Kinda sucks though.
customer_reviews.author: spazzinmekon

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one year.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this last July for a friend of mine to use when he comes over to play fighting games. He plays ps3, so the transforming d-pad made the transition a little easier for him. This product was really awesome up until about a month ago. We noticed the paint on the chrome d-pad was chipping off. Last night while playing Injustice: Gods Among Us, the entire d-pad broke off the controller. Rendering it useless. This controller probably saw action about once or twice a week for a year. I'm really disappointed in the quality of this product and will not be purchasing another one to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: NightTrauma

customer_reviews.title: BAD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I got this and immediately. When I was playing in the game my characters were firing the guns or stabbing when I did not press the button. Also the battery did not fit securely in the back. I have since learned to live with it as I missed the return window. Think I will just buy the black ones in the future.
customer_reviews.author: florencio

customer_reviews.title: Some thing need a little love and care
customer_reviews.text: Came with some of the paint flaking off and two screw in the bottom Batten's and one being a broken spring. Other then that it is a good control. So fixed it and it run fine
customer_reviews.author: Harley hamil

customer_reviews.title: A Subtle Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I've had many 360 controllers and this is my favorite. However, it isn't extremely different than the originals. The D-Pad is an improvement that I feel is fairly noticeable when using the controller for a period of time and then switching back to an older model. The finish is slightly matted which adds a nice feel to the controller. My only offered caveat would be the black rechargeable battery--should've been silver.
customer_reviews.author: Johanson

customer_reviews.title: Very good but two annoyances
customer_reviews.text: So this controller does have an improved DPAD and a tighter and more responsive analog stick. I like the muted tones buttons, but some will not. So my two problems with the controller are battery related. Using the recharge pack, you will have these issues. - Battery life - there are FOUR battery life indicators on the controller and normally you would expect an alert when the battery level reaches ONE. On this controller once it reaches level 2 you will see an annoying light cycle every thirty seconds on the controller face. - Battery life - from FOUR to TWO bars you will only get five-seven hours. The battery life is nowhere near 25 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Rhino

customer_reviews.title: It works better but still not well
customer_reviews.text: This controller is well build official Microsoft hardware. The directional pad tries to make up for the design flaws of the original controller. It works better but still not well. I like the plug and play kits because they have a fairly long cord and you never have to worry about having AA Batteries
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Boochard

customer_reviews.title: Minor changes, great product
customer_reviews.text: I did not know how much better this controller is compared to the older black/white/blue/red one. I personally like the silver color scheme and the black and white buttons, which might not be for everyone. Play and charge kit does what it is suppose to, personally would have wanted to buy without the kit since I already have one. Overall it is a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: sgt sweetnsour

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I got mine and it was all beat up and didn’t even work I suggest not ordering this
customer_reviews.author: tucker Murray

customer_reviews.title: Like the look and feel of the controller
customer_reviews.text: Plastic around the battery case is very weak. Both of mine broke within 6 months, batteries won't stay in anymore. Tried Guerilla gluing it back together but no dice. Like the look and feel of the controller, but now I can't use them!
customer_reviews.author: EJP

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME CONTROLLER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this controller! Way better than the factory controllers that don't have the transforming d pad! Easy to switch over from the disc to the cross! Will be ordering another one soon to add to my collection. If your looking for a awesome controller, BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: erren glover

customer_reviews.title: best controller, with charger, for any xbox console.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy with the stock control,(colors) & when I saw the grey I one with the charge and play, I knew I'd rip through games with no problem. It did take a few Weeks for the battery pack to give 25 hours of gameplay, and maybe a 2 hour difference with my Bluetooth xda adapter plugged into the controller.
customer_reviews.author: Pixiegirl19 and PCfixinman

customer_reviews.title: Super Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace an existing controller that was going on the blink, this is a fantastic price! If I needed them I would order 10 more. Fast shipping also, had it three days later. The controller has a great feel and I love the new adjustable D-pad, it is easy to switch back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Hood

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Product is damage and the description is innacurate. There is visible wear on the controller parts where you put your palms, many dents, scratches and discoloration. Also, there was supposed to be a charger included, but it was not. We bought it "new" apparently. I have pictures and will upload them later.
customer_reviews.author: nova gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I love the silver controller. You can usually find it on Amazon for a comparable price to the standard black wireless controller, and that makes this a much better buy. It comes with the charger kit (which is $20 on its own) and the controller has some small improvements made (eg: texture, grip, etc). I'll only buy the silver controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: i couldnt have asked for a more durable, excellent priced product than this. i would recommend this item for anyone needing a replacement. it is sleek, lightweight and worth every penny spent. my son enjoys it and that is what counts for me. a must have item.
customer_reviews.author: MR. RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until the D-Pad flew off.
customer_reviews.text: I got this controller the first day they were available. Had it for about two and a half months before I came in one morning to find the D-Pad on the floor. It had literally shot off the controller in the middle of the night. It was broken, there was nothing to screw back on or lock back into place. The entire controller was ruined, and $54 was down the drain. My recommendation is, save yourself some money and just get the standard Xbox controllers. The spinny D-Pad doesn't really make a difference anyway, and it may eventually just fly off the controller.
customer_reviews.author: ZakkOsborne

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Was Expecting
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this controller to fix all the issues with using the D-Pad on the 360 but it's only sorta better. Not worth the price. Also, they changed the color on the buttons, which is dumb since the entire system is based on colored buttons. Pretty disappointing and not worth straying from the original controllers.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Special Edition - Special Functionality
customer_reviews.text: Great controller, working flawlessly, good sturdy buttons, feels great in hand and very robust. Great reaction time while gaming. The pakage got all anyone would love in a new controller: *The Special Edition Controller (black and Silver is a deadly combo) *The rechargable batery (also black) *The Extra baterry pack for AA batteries (a suprising extra i didnt know it had) *The cable for rechargin + gaming while recharging. All in all a great buy. Cons: you cant recharge the battery pack with any charger, have to use the cable and have the Xbox tuerned on.
customer_reviews.author: wlizardo

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded controller
customer_reviews.text: Nice controller. I don't notice any *major* difference in functionality over the old version, but it does seem like it may be a little more sensitive (which, in this case is a good thing). The rocker pad seems unresponsive sometimes but this may just be a 'breaking in' thing. Still, I'm buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: M. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Sexy look, same feel and sensitivity as the original white controller!
customer_reviews.text: This controller looks great and controls the same as the regular controller. Same joystick sensitivity as the original white controller. The changes from the original are minimal, which is a great thing in my opinion. The battery has a long life, I charged it when I first got it and I haven't had to plug it back in yet (only played a few hours of gameplay though)!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Best controller ive had so far!
customer_reviews.text: With any serious gamer the control stick on controllers usually wear out pretty quick and become so unresponsive you have to get a new controller this one has had so little wiggle in the sticks and ive had it since christmas and played everyday since then its top quality you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Legato

customer_reviews.title: Controller Fine, Play and Charge Kit Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item in March. The controller itself seems to be in good condition and plays fine. The play and charge kit that came with the controller did not work. The cable is not able to maintain a steady connection to charge a battery pack. The battery pack is also not able to hold a charge, even when tested with an alternate charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Controller!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this controller for a while now, the first one I got delivered wasn't charging appropriately but the exchange was fast and easy with Amazon. The controller is fast and responsive, and the new Dpad is easy to switch and performs great in fighting games. I would recommend this controller!
customer_reviews.author: R. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Ok so far.......
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. When I first opened the controller I felt the weight difference. Its lighter than your normal wireless controller. It also feels a little smoother to me. Other than that, the dpad seems to work well. However I have heard of these falling off over time. If it does I will update, AND return!
customer_reviews.author: Rad Dad

customer_reviews.title: Best Xbox Controller Yet!
customer_reviews.text: This controller is just awesome. The color scheme is just great even without the button color. The controller itself has a brushed metal look and an almost metallic feel to the plating. Works just like any other controller with exception to the new D-Pad which feels tighter and more controlled. When "transformed" or rotated it feels the same but controls differently depending on the setting. The new setting "feels" the same as the standard but will only respond in up, down, left, right directions. This is the best controller you can get for the Xbox 360. I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Michelson

customer_reviews.title: Controller with some cool parts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this controller mainly for the grey scale buttons to put in my Halo 4 UNSC controller. The controller is just like any other now.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Meh, wore out pretty quick.
customer_reviews.text: The left control stick wore out in like 2 months... But I guess they make them like that so I keep on spending 45-60 on a controller again and again and again and again. Freaking gaming companies and their controllers. This is the oldest trick in the book.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Helfin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome controller
customer_reviews.text: Controller came in brand-spanking-new and works like a charm. I mainly got it for its aesthetic appeal but the material of the controller is different from the normal Xbox controllers. See... My hands get sweaty when I play but due to the almost matted material it absorbs my sweat and allows me to still play comfortably without worrying about the sweat or when my friends make fun of me did it haha!
customer_reviews.author: Stevo

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: The controller has a great design. Very sleek, shiny, and clean looking. I think the new directional pad is a major improvement. And the thumb grips for the joysticks are a little easier to use than previous models of the controller. The charger and rechargeable battery that came with the controller work great. The package complete with the controller, battery, and charger was a very fair price. Overall it is very great product for recreational and hardcore gamers alike.
customer_reviews.author: Lux 19

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: 2 major problems: (1) The battery only holds charge (when fully charged) for 30 min max. (2) The head set, which works perfectly with my other xbox controller, does not work with this controller; that is, I can hear fine, but players in my team always complain of a strange sound coming off of my mic. I inserted normal AA batteries, wondering if the battery that came with the controller is the problem, but it made no difference. I had to use my other controller. So, there must be a problem with the connection of this controller. I wish I could return it!
customer_reviews.author: adriele rosheger

customer_reviews.title: Thinking back (since moved on from 360) this was my worst controller.
customer_reviews.text: my original controller outlasted this, right analong went on me first then the left click started to go. Thinking back (since moved on from 360) this was my worst controller.... the sticks sucked, that littlle flippy D-pad was better (extra star for that) but should of just defaulted to it anyways.... yea this controller was bad.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Silver and Grey Controller
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly - love the silver & grey color scheme. I would highly recommend this product for players that are already used to the button layout of the XBox 360, as it has grey buttons (instead of the red, yellow, green and blue scheme) that can be difficult to read in low light. I also really like the adjustable depth of the corner areas on the d-pad. With the corners dropped it feels more like the old-school d-pads, and the shiny silver color of it just looks fantastic imo.
customer_reviews.author: Nick S

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: Like the color and the new D pad style. Only down side is the battery it came with was dead and didn't charge or even register in any control we have. Lucky I was able to talk to Amazon and got a small refund for the glitch.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pinard

customer_reviews.title: Xbox 360 Silver Controller and Play & Charge Kit
customer_reviews.text: Got this product quick in the mail. Holds a charge well, I'm not a hardcore gamer so I can't speak for hours of use daily but I don't see why this controller wouldn't be able to keep up with that.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Leisten

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Controller
customer_reviews.text: This controller is sweet. It's not meant to be a totally different controller so don't expect it to be, but it looks awesome and works just as well as any other Microsoft controller. The D-pad doesn't raise up when you twist it, the gray disc around the D-pad lowers so it still sticks up the same height on the controller. These are not meant to be replacements for all your current controllers but if you need another controller get one of these, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kloster

customer_reviews.title: Saves a fortune in batteries
customer_reviews.text: With four people in the house who use the Xbox controllers for Netflix and games, our controllers are going a good percentage of the day. We were blasting through batteries at an unbelievable rate. This set has been a great addition to our efforts to save money and be more environmentally friendly. Plus, telling the kids the purpose of putting the controllers in the charger has entirely eliminated the high incidence of the controllers getting lost in couch cushions or mysteriously disappearing. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat W.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite controller ever
customer_reviews.text: This controller is awesome. I love it. I have had it now for 4 years and I love it more each day.
customer_reviews.author: Joel H

customer_reviews.title: tons of hours of happy time
customer_reviews.text: i love this controller, the ergonomics, the shape, is great i dont play often but i like to do it more or less one time a week and is a great time with this controller on my pc
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ml Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Colorblind.
customer_reviews.text: It's about time Microsoft got around to fixing the digital pad, sadly they made one huge mistake by removing the color from the ABXY buttons. If it still had color it would be a perfect 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: RedOneStandingBy

customer_reviews.title: Style, comfort, and cool...
customer_reviews.text: Well, it is simply a 360 control, but the fact that is unique in color and the buttons are not colored makes it easy to conseal plays to those cheaters looking at other players. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Echevarria

customer_reviews.title: Not too different
customer_reviews.text: This is not too different from the standard Xbox 360 controller, except for the new D-Pad. But even in it's raised position, it doesn't change too much. Still a great controller.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Great controller.
customer_reviews.text: I love this controller, the only complaint I had with mine was that the joystick was rather squeaky. It would not stop so I finally replaced the board inside the shell. It works fine now and there is no squeak.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceCobra

customer_reviews.title: ... is meh but the wired attachment makes the controller great.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is meh but the wired attachment makes the controller great.
customer_reviews.author: H. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery pack!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to give this as a review, i love the controller its awesome, but the battery pack is bad. I've been using rechargeable batteries since i bought it, i went to use the battery pack it came with, it won't hold a charge. i don't know how to contact the seller to see if they'll correct it. I've had the same thing happen with xbox battery packs before, and stores have replaced them, i don't know how to get that done here.
customer_reviews.author: Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Good controller, I guess
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids play the games, not me. I don't know a controller from a wombat. But if they like it, I guess it must be good.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Color Blind
customer_reviews.text: OK, nothing real special with this controller vs. the other M$ branded ones. I guess I do prefer the way the D-Pad can be switched. However, the lack of color on the buttons really got me. I guess my brain relied on the colors more than the letters---plus the colors are easier to see in dim lighting. I ended up buying some 3rd party colored replacement buttons on eBay for $5 shipped and swapped them myself. You need a special screwdriver to do this though.
customer_reviews.author: Bro

customer_reviews.title: Poor finish quality
customer_reviews.text: The controller works perfectly. The only problem is that the finish of the controller has much worse wear than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sam L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Controller!
customer_reviews.text: The controller is a major improvement over the old one. The rings around the analog sticks are great for shooting games. The only complaint that I have about it is that the rumble feature is weaker. Overall it is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: boom10ful

customer_reviews.title: I love this Controller!
customer_reviews.text: I love this controller so much that when my first one broke for some unknown reason I promptly bought another one. It has a good feel and since it is silver I can tell mine apart from my kids and they know as well.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Plumb

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these controllers a while back and really love how the paint feels and doesn't ever get that slick feeling to it, used it for countless hours and never had to worry about it. I bought this one because I wore my joysticks down and wanted to get another one of these in case they stop selling them!
customer_reviews.author: TheRealReviews

customer_reviews.title: Great Controller
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concern about getting this product but the D-pad is GREAT. I love this controller and it comes with the charge kit. The only thing i didn't like is that the only way to charge the controller is through the XBOX 360. The charge kit doesn't work with USD adaptors. Lame, but the controller is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nano Machine64

customer_reviews.title: loved it
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, I had to revert back to using batteries though. The play and charge kit battery is absolute garbage, eventually stops hold a charge after about 20 charge ups.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: great but watch out
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking controler, ilove the look and the look od the new d pad. Also the new bowl grip for the joysticks works well for me. The only negative is the gap between the d pad and the controler skin. It will collect lots of stuff and almost needs to be taken apart to be cleaned. Had I. Known that I would have just bought a new skin and new joysticks. But aside from that one minor flaw, its a bad a** looking controler. Would still recomend
customer_reviews.author: chillactz

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It's a great contoller. Not sure why you need the spinny dpad. It doesn't do too much for you one way or the other. Pros: Looks cooler that the standard issue. Cheaper that other options. Cons: None. It's an xbox remote with an unnecessary add on. Do you like your current controller? This one is the same so if you need another one you should buy this one because it's the cheapest option.
customer_reviews.author: MeatySpamKnight

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent control, a battery life greater than the original control, ergonomic design set for a player's hand and a concurrent very interesting color for a control x-box 360.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Lara

customer_reviews.title: Silver 360 controller
customer_reviews.text: Control was exactly what he wanted. Still is using it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Must for Gamers
customer_reviews.text: i love love love this controller. so nice to be able to use the D-Pad without accidentally triggering the wrong direction
customer_reviews.author: GeekWad

customer_reviews.title: Just slightly better than the original xbox 360 controller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my old controller is completely worn out and I am not disappointed by my purchase. It basically works exactly like the original xbox 360 controller so if your expecting the new d-pad to be far superior to the original your out of luck. The d-pad is somewhat improved but not enough to buy a new control if you do not need one. Other than that the control looks better than any xbox control I have owned and it comes with a rechargeable battery so its convenient and a fair price for 45 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: FiveRabbit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love it!! Need to get another so my boys and I quit fighting over it!
customer_reviews.author: Jndzmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Silver Controller
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a new controller and wanted a charging kit also. This was perfect as it allows me to take it to a friends and not get our controllers mixed up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came broken and very dirty.
customer_reviews.text: It also didn't have the play and charge kit either,
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: this isn't a game either... lol
customer_reviews.text: amazon really thinks accessories are games when you review them but this thing rocks, cheap price and the controller itself is LEGIT... great dpad and the buttons are fresh, color scheme does work too haha
customer_reviews.author: MastaC

customer_reviews.title: Good controller
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't last the 36 hours as it says. It also starts to turn off when you have 1/4 of the battery left; however, it beats buying batteries and wasting them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice not great
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy imo it is a nice controller the d pad is definitely an improvement but I think most arcade style players would still rather a sectioned d pad. Seems to have a different type of paint that doesn't get as slippery in long play secessions but this could just be me over thinking but the fact that it comes with the play and charge kit mad this a must.
customer_reviews.author: T. Vales

customer_reviews.title: nice color no tricks
customer_reviews.text: a utilitarian controller with no pretty colors just 'steel' like look and quality. one of my favorite controllers. ...ok, extra words here to fill requirement. dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Fett

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets..
customer_reviews.text: Controller works great..battery and recharger works as expected. added AA battery case .. I like the color buttons gone. Looks much better in my opinion. AAA+
customer_reviews.author: MichaelD

customer_reviews.title: Xbox 360 Silver Controller and Play & Charge Kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought them since the price was good. Not much to say. Both the controler and the play & charge kit work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great controller, son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his birthday and he loves it....says it's much better than the regular controllers they have. Great deal here on Amazon at fifty bucks too.
customer_reviews.author: Contrisger

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Love the D-pad...actually prefer it to stay in the + setting for most games, works really well with Skyrim and Battlefield 3 which are mostly what I play at the moment
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Good controller
customer_reviews.text: Quality xbox controller. The dpad adjustment is useless fom my application but I guess it could be useful. I like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

product_meta.title: Xbox 360 Silver Controller and Play & Charge Kit
product_meta.description:
Customize your control. With a D-pad that transforms from a plus to a disc, the new Wireless Controller provides ultimate precision, accuracy and control for both directional as well as sweeping movements. This distinctively-designed controller features a special edition matte silver color with a unique and premium button design, and comes complete with a Play and Charge kit to keep the game going strong.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


XBOX 360® WIRELESS CONTROLLER WITH PLAY & CHARGE KIT
Customize your control. With a D-pad that transforms from a plus to a disc, the new Wireless Controller provides ultimate precision, accuracy and control for both directional as well as sweeping movements. This distinctively-designed controller features a special edition matte silver color with a unique and premium button design, and comes complete with a Play and Charge kit to keep the game going strong.
feature_bullets: Use up to four controllers simultaneously on one console
Integrated headset port for Xbox LIVE play
Adjustable vibration feedback for longer battery life
New left and right shoulder buttons are designed for ease of use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars465 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
